column3: Fixed inconsistent trailing space between cases.
Very very nice! This will help us get rid of circular dependencies permanently! Thanks for doing this.\n\nACK 54f16f23e886f6c37189aa53c86cdb0cefa809ea modulo nits
Nit: Please sort these entries to make it easy to find a specific circular dependency in the list.
These are sorted consistent with the output of `contrib/devtools/circular-dependencies.py`, which is deterministic. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13228#issuecomment-389701793
